mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.EMAIL , A.NAME , A.STATUS , A.INS_DT , A.UP_DT , A.LAST_LOGIN_DT , A.ADDRESS , A.PHONE , B.MEMBER_ID AS REF_MEMBER_ID , B.AUTHORITY_CODE AS REF_AUTH_CODE , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC FROM TBL_MEMBER A INNER JOIN TBL_ROLE B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON C.AUTHORITY_CODE = B.AUTHORITY_CODE WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
